name: lil-ivr-bot
description: A goofy Swedish SoundCloud rapper chatbot Chrome extension

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:extension
scripts.build:extension: mkdir -p dist && cp extension/manifest.json extension/content.js extension/background.js extension/chatbot-app.js extension/chatbot.css extension/popup.html extension/popup.js dist/ && mkdir -p dist/assets && (cp -r extension/assets/* dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || echo '# Icon assets would go here' > dist/assets/README.md)
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && python3 -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000

author: Lil IVR Bot Team
